title: Fluid flow pipe with changing radius

content.question: Water flows at a constant rate to the right through the portion of a circular horizontal pipe shown in the figure. Section <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math> of the pipe has radius <math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> and length <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math>, Section <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math> of the pipe has radius <math alttext="the fraction r over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> and length <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math>, and Section <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Z</mtext></math> of the pipe has radius <math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> and length <math alttext="4 L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi>L</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the speed of the water in Section <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Y</mtext></math>, <math alttext="v sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>, and and Section <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Z</mtext></math>, <math alttext="v sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>, to the speed of the water in Section <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math>, <math alttext="v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub Y equals v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> ; <math alttext="v sub Z equals v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub Y equals v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> ; <math alttext="v sub Z is greater than v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub Y is greater than v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> ; <math alttext="v sub Z equals v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub Y is greater than v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> ; <math alttext="v sub Z is greater than v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub Y is greater than v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> ; <math alttext="v sub Z equals v sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
